availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to America Jane Young Welch in Owen County in September 1858. Student in Henry County in 1850. Resident in Henry County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 403B.

Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Enumeration District: 092, New Castle, p. 3B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, 1793-1862, Film #001943449, p. 682 of 729 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
